Document:
# Aberrant Flesh
A shambling mass of flesh, animated through anomalous energy. Even though the anomaly that created them was long gone, the creatures were resilient enough to survive on their own. For the most part, aberrant flesh monsters utilize brute force and numerical advantage to eliminate threats however some of them developed means of inflicting damage from afar.
# Known variants ## "Jared"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Above medium - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] Blunt - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Mindless brutes that will attempt to close the distance without the slightest concern for their survival.
## "Golem"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Medium - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] Blunt - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Just like "Jareds", "Golems" are mindless brutes, but slightly more fragile in stature and faster moving than "Jared" variants.
## "Clamp"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Below medium - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] Pierce (Spikes), Slash (Maw) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier, Shooter
"Clamps" are flying variants that developed mutations enabling them to shoot biological projectiles: either [color=#a4885c]bone spikes[/color] containing harmful chemicals or [color=#a4885c]maws[/color] - immobile flesh boring creatures, that will attach themselves to the target and start gnawing through their way inside.
## "Lover"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Below medium - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] Blunt - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier
Akin to "Jareds" and "Golems", but can fly.
## "Horror"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Significantly above medium - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] Slash, Bleeding - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier
# Missions targets ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]aberrant flesh horror[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]flesh clump[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
